ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
taskDescription: Search Opus (https://opus.nlpl.eu/) for a corpus in the domain and language combination that best suits your translation course or interests. Train an NMT engine on MutNMT with it. Use this engine to get the translation of a text already known by your students and discuss with them what kinds of pre-editings would have improved the raw MT output.
placeholderText: Texts with domain-specific terminology and phraseology are particularly appropriate for this activity.
